product_name: Mountain Hardwear Chiller Ball Cap - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Chiller Ball Cap is the go-to lightweight headgear for any aerobic activity. It gives you immediate and ongoing cooling with Cool.Q(TM) ZERO technology. Cool.Q ZERO technology features sweat-activated cooling polymers embedded in the fabric that help lower the fabric's temperature. Wrinkle-resistant, quick-drying polyester fabric is lightweight, breathable and durable. With a UPF 25 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh sides allow cooling airflow to keep you comfortable on hot days. Closed-cell foam brim keeps the hat afloat in water. Mountain Hardwear Chiller(TM) Ball Cap has elastic in back for a comfortable fit. Dark color on the underside of the brim helps reduce glare in your eyes on sunny days. Closeout.
